DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Aquarium Stamp Kit - Dolphin, Seal, Shark (3 colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Aquarium Stamp Kits are a perfect way to make your next party fun and exciting with its aquarium themed designs. The Kit includes 3 face paint stamps (dolphin, seal and shark) and 3 of Snazaroo's 2 ml face paints (bright pink, sky blue and turquoise).
Snazaroo's specially designed EVA stamps are perfect for use on children. The stamps are approximately one and a half inches at the widest point and one inch thick. Easy to use even for beginner users.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: This Snazaroo Stamp Kit will paint about 750 cheek art designs.
Includes 3 face paint stamps (dolphin, seal and shark) and 3 of Snazaroo's 2 ml face paints (bright pink, sky blue and turquoise).
One of the most popular face paints in the world
